item.description:
Join Us At The 2ND Annual Portsmouth Signature Cocktail Competition.
There Will Be Eight Downtown Portsmouth Restaurants All Competiting
for the Title Of Best Signature Cocktail Of Portsmouth.

Participating Restaurants Include:

The Riverwatch At Sheraton Portsmouth
The Blue Mermaid And Bacardi
The Hilton Garden Inn
Rudi's Portsmouth
The Library Restaurant
Brazo Restaurant
The Dolphin Striker
The Page

Enjoy Cocktail Tasting, Souvenier Shot Glass And A Celebrity Style Goodie Bag.
Join Us At The Page At 8 pm And Vote For Your Favorite Signature Cocktail.
Special Bono-Fied Guest and Live Music!

Purchase Your Event Pass Today Click Here
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing "Its Always Five O'Clock Somewhere"cocktail tank top
item.why: You will enjoy this event because you get to meet new people, network and enjoy cocktail tastings from eight restaurants.
item.name: 2nd Annual Portsmouth Cocktail Competition June 1st 5-8 pm
